text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

Alright! Let's start the strategy
meeting for the "Thanksgiving"!
Sure/Okay/Sure...
"Producer, how's everything going~?"

Oh, it's about that strategy meeting, but it
might take a little longer than expected.
It seems like Yuika might not be able to participate.

"Oh, that's unfortunate~. Got it! Leave it to me!
I'll come up with an amazing strategy!"

Oh~...!
It's already over, huh...?

Yeah...
...? Huh...? This notebook--

Wow! Is this today's meeting time?! Sakuyan
really put effort into summarizing it...!

Yeah...
But...

These last notes, somehow...
They're a bit unusual for Sakuya...

"I wanted to wait for both of you, but considering the
situation, we went ahead with a bit of progress together."
"We'll be fine. Please don't worry."
"Thank you for your hard work on the job"......

Hmm? Well,
Mitsumine's note doesn't seem odd to me at all...
And besides, you know...

As long as they're saying 'We'll be fine,'
it's better to believe them, right?
...Huh? Well...

Even if I say that,
I'm sure P-tan would still worry, right~?

(Yeah... If it's just my imagination,
then that's fine...)
